definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: So it remains for me to thank you for coming.
sentences.chinese: 再有就是我非常感謝你們到我的公司來。

sentences.english: Qin teachers are very grateful for their support.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝覃老師對我們的支持。

sentences.english: Anyway, thank you for all your time.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，我非常感謝你的幫忙。

sentences.english: We deeply appreciate Russia's expression of solidarity with India at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 我們非常感謝俄羅斯此時此刻對印度表達的團結精神。

sentences.english: Your cooperate is returning the enclosed form promptly would be much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 我公司將非常感謝貴方早日寄回信內所附的表格。

sentences.english: Thank you for all of your wonderful creations.
sentences.chinese: 親們的創作都非常漂亮，真的非常感謝。

sentences.english: A middle-aged woman asked for a glass of water and was very thankful to the young man.
sentences.chinese: 一位中年婦女喝了一杯水，非常感謝他。

sentences.english: I greatly appreciate this opportunity to visit this beautiful and affluent country.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感謝有此機會來訪問這個美麗富饒的國家。

sentences.english: Thanks for our friends' faith and supports to our company.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝各位朋友一直以來對榮冠的信任與支持。

sentences.english: Thank you for writing this book.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝你寫了這本書。

sentences.english: Sorry for this and thanks for your action.
sentences.chinese: 對此不便我深感抱歉，同時非常感謝你行動。

sentences.english: Very grateful to Dr. Tao Xie solution cured my shoulder pain.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝解濤醫生治好了我的肩痛。

sentences.english: I greatly appreciate this opportunity to visit this beautiful and prosperous country.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感謝有此機會訪問這個美麗富饒的國家。

definition: to arrive (esp. of notable person)/to visit (more formal than 光臨|光临[guang1 lin2])
to be concerned about/to care about
to help/to lend a hand/to do a favor/to do a good turn
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
